## Source: amazon-inspector (02ecf4d35a03a77c6c6665e814830b4111dd4c3e969a800697b3ca6dc0eeaebc)
The package karem10 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d2bf23a7af43498c68b78f4d0e45aa2dec25a1ea950bc0c7b9b0d880ec35b913)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'karem10' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
